p:
Mice used were C57BL/6J mice (JAX 000664), Nlrp3
−/− [ 41], Casp1/11
−/− [ 62], Aim2
−/− [ 63], Nlrc4
−/− [ 64], Asc
−/− [ 65] and Il1r
−/− (JAX 003245), all on a C57BL/6 mouse background. When indicated, the JAX Nlrp3
−/− (JAX stock #017969) was also used [ 40]. All mice were bred and maintained under specific-pathogen-free conditions at the Animal Facilities of the Medical School Ribeirão Preto (FMRP-USP). For in vitro experiments bone marrow were collected from 6–12 week old female and/or male mice. The in vivo experiments were conducted using 6–8 week old mice.
